title: Meals for Invisibles
shortDescription: Providing food for homeless and underprivileged cancer patients who often go unnoticed.
fullDescription: Meals for Invisibles is a special initiative focused on providing nutritious food to homeless and underprivileged cancer patients who often go unnoticed in the healthcare system. This program ensures that even the most vulnerable members of our community receive the nutrition they need during cancer treatment, regardless of their housing or financial status.
features: Daily meal distribution in key locations
Outreach to identify and support homeless cancer patients
Coordination with local shelters and social services
